channel.title: Hack Prevention 317 PI
channel.description: Recently, someone hacked into my rsps and spawned items using packets, or something like that I'm not exactly sure. He said something about packets, but does anyone know how to prevent people from hacking into your packets?

item.title: Hack Prevention 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

Thank you for the help sk8erdude.

Read full topic

item.title: Hack Prevention 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“arean1, post:10, topic:550285”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=669197.msg4474919#msg4474919 date=1425168183]

They could have used Bomb’s cheat client to spawn ground items. In which case you should fix your tele-grab. But there are many other ways in which someone could have spawned items on your server.

Bomb’s cheat client… Are we in 2009 again?
[/quote]

And still works to this day. So this post is just irrelevant.[/quote]
Technically, so is your reply.
So, lets not do this, and just help the person.
Because, we can also say your reply even mentioning bombs cheat client is irrelevant, as it provides no solution.

Read full topic

item.title: Hack Prevention 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

beale:

i just want to know how to make the server sided checks

Basically:

if(playerHasItem(itemId) == false) System.out.println("The player doesn't have this item"); else System.out.println("The player does have the item. so lets do whatever we were gonna.");

item.title: Hack Prevention 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Server sided checks.

You know that region clipping system released? that reads cache map data server sided.

Use that to read the map data and verify players clicked objects that exist and so on.

If you’re loading higher revision maps/objects on your client, you will need to do some edits to the region system as well as dump the new data for it to read.

Read full topic

item.title: Hack Prevention 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

9/10 chances he didn’t “Hack into” your RSPS.
He either used Cheat Engine or Silabsoft’s Rune Agent to send the packets. No hacks whatsoever.

Not their fault your server doesn’t check things it should.

Read full topic
